title: Large 2 Bedroom, with newly renovated kitchen
posting_body: ['Large, sunny 2-bedroom apartment, stretching the entire second floor (1300 square feet) of an owner-occupied house is available September 1.', 'In addition to the bedrooms; the apartment has two-glassed-in porches, one on each end, a very large living room, dining room and several closets.', 'Both the bathroom and kitchen have been renovated recently with high-end appliances, including a dishwasher.', 'The house is a well-maintained wood frame building (circa 1910) on East 4th Street, a quiet, tree-lined residential neighborhood.', 'Amenities/Services (restaurants, pharmacies, produce markets, laundromat, dry- cleaners) and public transportation (subways/buses) are steps away on Church Ave.', 'Prospect Park (lake end) and Green Wood Cemetery are 15 minutes away by foot and the Ocean Parkway bike trail is three blocks away.', '$3000 a month, plus security deposit.', 'References are required.']
